definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

pinyin: di4 zhi3 jie3 xi1 xie2 yi4
wang3 luo4 di4 zhi3 zhuan3 huan4

sentences.english: The first memory bank corresponding to a first range of addresses.
sentences.chinese: 第一存储体与第一范围的地址相对应。

sentences.english: Check if this machine has a public IP address.
sentences.chinese: 检测这台机器是否有一个公网IP地址。

sentences.english: The Scandinavian countries have the highest number of IPs per person.
sentences.chinese: 斯堪的纳维亚国家的人均IP地址数最高。

sentences.english: Unable to send test Message. Please verify the E-mail Address field.
sentences.chinese: 无法发送测试消息，请检查“电子邮件地址”字段。

sentences.english: E-mail addresses can have several forms, even though there is a standard format.
sentences.chinese: 电子邮件地址有多种格式，但是有一种标准格式。

sentences.english: The phone gave me its IP address on my home network.
sentences.chinese: 电话的IP地址马上显示在我的家庭网络中。

sentences.english: It can be difficult to keep your email address spam-free.
sentences.chinese: 让你的电邮地址没有垃圾信件是困难的事。

sentences.english: The other is the MAC address, which typically does not change.
sentences.chinese: 另一个是MAC地址，一个通常不会改变的地址。

sentences.english: The other is the MAC address, which typically does not change.
sentences.chinese: 另一个是MAC地址，一个通常不会改变的地址。

sentences.english: We walk around the neighborhood. We learn street names and addresses.
sentences.chinese: 我们在家附近散步，我们学习街道的名字和地址。

sentences.english: It is located in the beautiful Tongxiang City, Zhejiang Province, on a rich plain praised as "homeland of fish and rice".
sentences.chinese: 地址坐落在环境秀美的“鱼米之乡”浙江省桐乡市。

sentences.english: Select the address string and copy it to the clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 选择地址字符串并将其复制到剪贴板。

sentences.english: Please address your letter to the head-master's office.
sentences.chinese: 请在信上写好地址寄给该校校长室。

sentences.english: Ane-mail address of the organization responsible for correspondence related to the exhibition.
sentences.chinese: 有关展览的电子邮件通讯地址的组织工作。

sentences.english: How to modify a contact number in address book programatically?
sentences.chinese: 如何修改地址簿程序联系号码吗？

definition: time of business/opening hours (of shop)/working time
